text: @Gdad1 It’d be IRONIC going forward that the COVID19 virus KILLS MORE @realDonaldTrump supporters just due to THEIR OWN IDIOCY! Of WORSHIPING HIM BELIEVING DRINKING & BREATHING HIS LIES! They TRULY WANT TO MARSHAL LAW the MAJORITY of AMERICANS! They deserve it cause they voted 4 him!!!!
